Great vibe, great food, great tapas.  Our favorites: padrón peppers, iberico ham and manchego cheese, red peppers and goat cheese, olives, eggplant with goat cheese and ceviche.  Don't forget the Vermut and Cava.  We came here twice in three days....the second time after being very disappointed in a Plaça Reial tourist trap....wish I could eat here every night.--
